assignments.name: Assign_Wr_Shipment_ShipmentItems_0
assignments.label: Assign Wr Shipment ShipmentItems for SecondHandProduct

rules.name: SkuErrorFormula
rules.conditionLogic: 2 AND (1 OR ( 3 AND 6 ) OR ( 4 AND 7 )) AND 5
rules.label: SkuErrorFormula

fields.name: FOLI
fields.fieldText:
Order Summary Number : {!Get_FO_Record.OrderSummary.OrderNumber}


Fulfillment Order Number : {!Get_FO_Record.FulfillmentOrderNumber}


Fulfillment Line Item Number : {!L10_Over_FOLI_Selected.foliName}


SKU : {!L10_Over_FOLI_Selected.productSKU}


Description : {!L10_Over_FOLI_Selected.description}

fields.name: NotOkSKU
fields.fieldText: The field sku10Digits is empty or contains more or less than 10 digits or not coherent with the Product Sku

fields.name: isSecondHandMessage
fields.fieldText: The field sku10Digits is empty or contains more or less than 10 digits or not coherent with the Master SKU

fields.name: Info
fields.fieldText:
Select Fulfillment Line Items To Ship


Order Summary Number : {!Get_FO_Record.OrderSummary.OrderNumber}


Fulfillment Order Number : {!Get_FO_Record.FulfillmentOrderNumber}

fields.name: error_message_text
fields.fieldText: At least one item should be selected to continue

value.stringValue: FOLI Number,SKU,Quantity,Serial Numbers,Tracking Number,Dispatch Date,Delivery Method
